verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Yield not to temptation, For yielding is sin, Each vict’ry will help you Some other to win; Fight manfully onward, Dark passions subdue, Look ever to Jesus, He will carry you through.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Ask the Savior to help you, Comfort, strengthen, and keep you, He is willing to aid you, He will carry you through.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Shun evil companions, Bad language disdain, God’s name hold in rev’rence, Nor take it in vain; Be thoughtful and earnest, Kindhearted and true, Look ever to Jesus, He will carry you through.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: To him that o’ercometh God giveth a crown, Thro' faith we will conquer, Though often cast down; He, who is our Savior, Our strength will renew, Look ever to Jesus, He will carry you through.
